document_data.name: ''The Warrior of Love''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Warrior of Love''''' was an omnibus of erotic fiction found in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Contents: The book held a collection of tales based on the concept of a [[paladin]] of [[Sune]] who received a divine quest from their goddess. In order to prove their devotion to love, they had to lie with someone from every town on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.History: A copy was kept in the library of the [[Sharess' Caress]] brothel in [[1492 DR]].
